name: float_contact_me
author: Matt Lee

sections.description:
This plugin allows you all the readers and viewers through QQ, MSN and e-mail to communicate with you.Support me by link to my website.

My website:http://www.yterbihou.com/

For more information,refer to float_contact_me

Support me by introducing this plugin to your friends, or give me a high rate on WordPress.org .Thank you!
sections.installation:
1. Upload the full directory into your wp-content/plugins directory.
  2. Activate the plugin at the plugin administration page.
  3. Go to “Control Panel – plugin – contact me,” set your contact details (the default contact all your website email), email, qq, msn message, fill it out and save the changes you can use.
  4. That’s it!
sections.faq:
If you find any problems, please contact me,my website:http://www.yterbihou.com/

For more information,refer to float_contact_me
